src:
首里城視察の衛藤沖縄相「国が責任をもってやることが必要」

04 Nov 2019, 10:07



火災現場を視察後、焼損した首里城の一部をバックに報道陣の取材に応じる衛藤沖縄相（４日午後、那覇市の首里城公園で）＝矢野恵祐撮影

　衛藤沖縄相は４日、１０月３１日に火災で焼失した那覇市の首里城を視察した。「県民は大きな心の痛手を受けたのではないか。一刻も早く修復しなければいけない」と記者団に述べ、県と協議して早期に再建計画を策定する考えを示した。
　衛藤氏は、「（首里城の）所有権は国なので、国が責任をもって（再建計画の策定を）やることが必要だ」とも強調した。ただ、再建費用を沖縄振興予算とは別枠で政府が計上するべきだとの声が地元や与党内から出ていることについては、「決めているわけではない」として、明言を避けた。
　衛藤氏の視察は、県警や消防による実況見分が続く中、焼失した正殿とは広場を挟んで反対側に立つ奉神門付近から行われた。
text:
Mr. Eto Okinawa, visiting Shuri Castle

04 Nov 2019, 10:07



After visiting the fire site, Mr. Eto Okinawa responds to the reporter's interview with a part of Shuri Castle burned down (afternoon of Shuri Castle Park, Naha City) = Keisuke Yano

Mr. Eto Okinawa visited Shuri Castle in Naha City, which was destroyed by fire on October 4th. “I think the citizens of the prefecture have suffered a great deal of pain. They must be repaired as soon as possible,” he told the reporters, and showed the idea of discussing with the prefecture and formulating a reconstruction plan at an early stage.
Mr. Eto stressed that “the ownership of (Shuri Castle) is the country, so it is necessary for the country to take responsibility (form the reconstruction plan)”. However, the government said that the government should account for the reconstruction costs separately from the Okinawa promotion budget.
Mr. Eto's inspection was conducted from the vicinity of Fengjin Gate on the opposite side of the square from the main hall, which was destroyed by fire, while the prefectural police and the fire department continued to see the actual situation.
